manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What material is the desk made out of? It’s made out of manufactured/engineered wood. Can you switch the sides to install the cabinet and drawers? Hello, no you can not. Can you pay to have someone put it together? At this time we do not offer that service for our products. Does this desk have a finished back? Hi there, no. It's no painted at the back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little desk, good value
reviews.reviewText: Needed a desk to work-from-home. I wanted a small space with some storage. This fit my space perfectly. Price was amazing. Very sturdy. The cabinet door needs adjusting but it’s designed for that. Drawer rolls smoothly. I’m right-handed, needed laptop to sit towards the left so I can write on papers on the right. So having the drawer and cabinet on the right allowed this.Assembly was challenging, pieces looked similar and were not numbered even though instructions showed this. Some holes were not pre-drilled. Wooden dowels that helped keep items together pushed too far into one piece (holes should’ve been drilled halfway). But final project is great. The instructions gave an “actual size” drawing of hardware so easy to match and find the correct size screws. Desk is very sturdy and plumb/level. I’d recommend it for small spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As expected and just what I want
reviews.reviewText: This desk matches my other furniture and looks great. It has 3 drawers and 1 larger storage on the left side, which meets what I need.Even the package included a very clear instruction with QR code that you can scan and follow the video instructions, however, I only found 2 boards that marked the number and I needed to measure all other boards and mark the numbers myself, this is the only thing I'm not appreciated, other than that is good. And I was able to assemble it myself without my husband's help at all.And I do like some other small things, such as they provided the small plastic cover to cover the screws to make the desk looks nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent desk...a bit challenging to assemble...on the pricier side
reviews.reviewText: Desk went together fairly easy...took about 90 min. However, many of the parts did not have the corresponding part number attached. Requires some patience to match the pic to the part. But, if you've done a few of these types of pieces, it's fairly intuitive. After it's assembled, the desk is nice and solid and heavy. You may need two people to carry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Desk
reviews.reviewText: This was the perfect addition to my mother's room. It took the place of 3 pieces of furniture allowing us to free up so much space for her. This one piece is like a desk, file cabinet and bookshelf all in one. The instructions were clear, the parts were all nicely labeled, and I was able to assemble it by myself with no problem. The finish is beautiful, and the material is strong and sturdy. It fits perfectly in the space. Great product at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of Money! Too cheap, believe all bad reviews
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I really had high hopes after seeing the good reviews. Not only was this the most intricate assembly ever, it also is the cheapest material possible. It cost way too much to take 3.5 hours to install. Very very flimsy & the drawer flap doesn’t stop falling apart when opening & the bottom drawer is off centered. I want my money back. I have put together other furniture items from Amazon over the years & none has been this hard to assemble &&& fall apart with screws in place.. it’s almost like there needs to be more screws to help keep the parts together. If I could rank it Zero stars I would

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap materials, difficult to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Parts came with no numbers and the instructions mention numbers for each part. Assembly took couple of days with few hours spent on each day. Also the materials were of low quality, not worth the price we paid. I am keeping it only to avoid the hassle of disassembling and shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice starter desk
reviews.reviewText: Separate the hardware and label individual pieces before starting. It will take a while but it is not hard if you label parts before starting. You will have extra fasteners when done. The recommendation to assemble on the cardboard is a good idea.

I really like how quickly this desk arrived. The instructions were clear and it took about an hour to assemble this desk. The product itself is quite sturdy with a modern look. The price point is fantastic and I am very happy with this purchase. The only thing that I would change is the storage shelf. I would like to put my keyboard on that center shelf and pull it forward when I am using it, and push it back into the desk when not in use. The shelf on this desk is stationary. Overall, I am very satisfied with this purchase and would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Desk very sturdy. Ordered one delivered and assembled the next looks very smart
Super notice donc montage facile même à une personneLong mais étroit donc parfait pour les chambre un peu petiteBeaucoup de possibilité de rangementRendu topissime

Rapport qualité prix c'est ce que j'ai reçu pour le prix que j'ai payé...durée : aujourd'hui on ne veut pas que ça dure sinon on prend du bois massifpratique : peu large 45 cm c'est ce que j'avais besoin et assez long pour mettre une lampe et un cassier à tiroirs que demander de plus...j'aime les trois grands tiroirs et j'aime la porte avec une étagère, au final il y a de grands rangements et c'est ce que j'avais besoin.Je n'ai pas testé la solidité en montant sur le bureau, mais il est assez solide pour mon PC, ma lampe, mes babioles et mes avant bras. Je suis contente de mon achat. (Ps: Je trouve les boutons superbes bon choix)Montage : facile c'est numéroté et on suit bien la notice pas à pas.Le - et en jouant la difficile, ce sont les cotés un tout petit peu rugueux (pour nos mains de femme :) )

Der Schreibtisch wurde schnell und gut verpackt geliefert. So konnte ich nach dem auspacken keine Beschädigungen feststellen. Die einzelnen Teile sind alle ordentlich verpackt. Mittels der beiliegenden Anleitung geht ein Zusammenbau leicht von der Hand, danach steht der Tisch stabil und sicher auf dem Boden. Die Optik gefällt, weil die Farbe dezent ist. Da der Tisch nicht so groß ist, ist er ideal für kleinere Raume. Dafür bietet er aber sehr viel Stauraum, um viele Sachen unterzubringen. Im Großen und Ganzen hatte mit der Tisch sehr gut gefallen.
